# Brooks Floor Covering

> Brooks Floor Covering is a family-owned professional flooring company serving the Greater Phoenix Area, Arizona since 1980. We provide flooring sales, installation, repairs, concrete services, and specialty tile work for residential and commercial clients. Licensed, bonded, and insured — ROC #226840. Phone: (623) 688-8422.

Brooks Floor Covering has over 30 years of experience in the floor covering industry. We are known for exceptional quality, honest pricing, and going the extra mile on every project. We partner with industry-leading manufacturers including Mohawk, Shaw, Arizona Tile, Daltile, and others.

- Ceramic Tile
- Natural Stone
- Carpet

### Floor Repairs

Expert repair services for all types of flooring. From minor fixes to major repairs, we ensure your floors look and function their best.

Repair services include:

- Cracked Tile Replacement
- Carpet Restretch
- Vinyl Plank Replacement
- Grout Repairs
- Carpet Seam Repair

### Concrete Services

Professional concrete services for both residential and commercial projects. From moisture mitigation to polishing, we handle all your concrete needs.

Concrete services include:

- Moisture Mitigation
- Concrete Grinding
- Floor Leveling
- SLU Pours
- Epoxy Coatings
- Concrete Polishing

Custom solutions beyond traditional flooring. We provide a wide range of specialty services to meet your unique needs.
